  • Constructor Details

    • RIAgreementGroupBuilder

      public RIAgreementGroupBuilder()

  • Method Details

    • uiReadyHOP

      public static RIAgreementGroupBuilder uiReadyHOP()
      Returns a builder to construct a UI ready RIAgreementGroup. The following fields are set:
      • ExternalRiskID
      • RiskName
      • Claim
      Returns:
      the updated builder

    • uiReady

      public static RIAgreementGroupBuilder uiReady(Claim claim)
      Returns a builder to construct a UI ready RIAgreementGroup on the given claim. The following fields are set:
      • ExternalRiskID
      • RiskName
      • Claim
      Returns:
      the updated builder

    • uiReady

      public static RIAgreementGroupBuilder uiReady(ValueGenerator<? extends Claim> claimGenerator)
      Returns a builder to construct a UI ready RIAgreementGroup with Claim from the claimGenerator. The following fields are set:
      • ExternalRiskID
      • RiskName
      • Claim
      Returns:
      the updated builder

      Returns:
